The PP-2000 is the latest development of the Instrument Design Bureau (KBP) from Tula, Russia. The weapon find its niche as a personal defence weapon for non-infantry military personnel as well as a close combat weapon for special forces and special law enforcement teams. As such, it is a compact weapon with few parts for increased reliability, simplified maintenance and low cost. It is best suited for close combat.
